name: Highway Drive
description:
In Highway Drive you will take control the car and try not to get in crash as long as you can. You can accelerate and decelerate your vehicle, so gameplay becomes more entertaining! In critical situation you can ride on roadside but your score will decrease. To earn double points you can drive by oncoming lane. Challenge your friends and take the highest score!

Features:

-Nice pixel graphics

-Oncoming lane

-Roadside

-Different gamemodes

Controls:

-WASD/Arrow keys
